metadata.title: CVE-2021-45342 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability in CDataList of the jwwlib component ofLibreCAD 2.2.0-rc3 and older allows an attacker to achieve Remote CodeExecution using a crafted JWW document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
librecad-data - 2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librecad package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
